alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:01PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dale, Coffee, northeastern Geneva and northwestern Houston Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 801 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pinckard to near Enterprise to Elba. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind around 45 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Dothan, Hartford, Midland City, Level Plains, Slocomb, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Lee, Malvern, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Mixons Crossroads and Kellys Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
